moreInfo.title: Metadata screen
content: Manage your type metadata on current screen.
Metadata can be assigned to specified caches.
Generated cluster with caches with metadata configuration available on summary screen.

metadata.label: Metadata common
tip: Metadata properties common to Query and Store

fields.label: Caches
tip: Select caches to associate metadata with cache

fields.label: Key type
tip: Key class used to store key in cache

fields.label: Value type
tip: Value class used to store value in cache

metadata.label: Metadata for SQL query
tip: Metadata properties for fields queries

fields.label: Fields
tip: Collection of name-to-type mappings to be queried, in addition to indexed fields

fields.label: Aliases
tip: Mapping from full property name in dot notation to an alias that will be used as SQL column name
For example: {"parent.name" -> "parentName"}

fields.label: Indexes
tip: Collection of indexes

metadata.label: Metadata for cache store
tip: Metadata properties for binding database with cache via POJO cache store

fields.label: Database schema
tip: Schema name in database

fields.label: Database table
tip: Table name in database

fields.label: Key fields
tip: Collection of key fields descriptions for CacheJdbcPojoStore

fields.label: Value fields
tip: Collection of value fields descriptions for CacheJdbcPojoStore

metadataDb.label: Driver JAR
tip: Select appropriate JAR with JDBC driver
To add another driver you need to place it into '/jdbc-drivers' folder of Ignite Web Agent
Refer to Ignite Web Agent README.txt for for more information

metadataDb.label: JDBC Driver
metadataDb.placeholder: Full class name of JDBC driver
tip: Full class name of JDBC driver that will be used to connect to database

metadataDb.label: JDBC URL
tip: JDBC URL for connecting to database
Refer to your database documentation for details

metadataDb.label: User
tip: User name for connecting to database

metadataDb.label: Password
tip: Password for connecting to database
Note, password would not be saved in preferences for security reasons

metadataDb.label: Tables only
tip: If selected then only tables metadata will be parsed
Otherwise table and view metadata will be parsed
